answers.answer: Surgeries differ with complexities so this is a question that should be asked of your attending physician. Did you have a diabetes related question or you just didn't know where to post and chose this forum out of the blue?

The answer is yes, as long as the wound has healed. There is nothing involving the commercial  flying experience that would have any adverse affect whatsoever. Avoid having the stewardesses bite on your legs.

question: is it safe to fly after having a leg angioplasty procedure?
title: leg angioplasty
